title: Wild Magic
description: Daine is desperate to forget the past. The bandit attack. The slaughter of her family. Her madness. Calling to the wolves, running with the pack, smelling blood, smelling vengeance...But she cannot forget. Power over wild magic is Daine's birthright, and protecting Tortall her destiny. Daine must master her rare and wondrous power, or else see friends and home destroyed once more...
author: Tamora Pierce
